name: Jan's Pasta-N-Peas with Tuna and Sun-Dried Tomatoes
author: Bumble Bee
summary: This is a fresh and modern take on two recipes from my Italian mother-in-law.  Fresh peas in place of canned, sun dried tomatoes in place of heavy tomato sauce and Bumble Bee® Solid White Albacore Tuna in Water replacing tuna in oil. This is a fast and flavorful meal to put together with just a few shelf stable ingredients.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta, cooked and kept warm
2 (5 ounce) cans Bumble Bee® Solid White Albacore Tuna in Water, undrained
½ cup julienne cut sun-dried tomatoes with herbs, drained, oil reserved
Salt and black pepper to taste
1 pinch Crushed red pepper flakes to taste
¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese for topping  (Optional)
directions: Place the oil from the sun dried tomatoes in a large saute pan over medium heat
Cook over medium heat until onions begin to turn translucent, about 4 minutes
Add the broth to the onions and bring to a simmer
Stir in the peas and the sun dried tomatoes
Peas should remain crisp so be careful not to over cook
Stir in undrained tuna and heat through
Be careful not to break up too many large pieces of the tuna while stirring
Add salt and pepper to taste and crushed red pepper if desired
Garnish with parsley and top with grated Parmesan cheese
